key.name: hide-panel
key.summary: Hide the panel when showing coverflow
key.description: Whether to show or hide the panel when CoverflowAltTab is active.

key.name: animation-time
key.summary: The duration of coverflow animations in ms
key.description: Define the speed of the CoverflowAltTab animations.

key.name: dim-factor
key.description: Define dimming of the background. Smaller means darker.

key.name: preview-scale
key.description: Scale the preview windows based on the monitor size between 0(0% monitor size) and 10(100% monitor size)

key.name: position
key.summary: Position of icon and window title
key.description: Whether the icon and window title should be placed below or above the window preview.

key.name: offset
key.description: Set a vertical offset. Positive values move the whole Coverflow up, negative down.

key.name: icon-size
key.description: Set the icon size for the "Classic" icon-style

key.name: icon-size-big
key.description: Set the icon size for the "Overlay" icon-style

key.name: icon-title-spacing
key.description: Horizontal offset (in pixels): negative value moves the title label to left, positive to right

key.name: icon-style
key.description: Whether the application icon should be displayed next to the title lable or as an overlay.
